ModMetaData.name: Adeptus Mechanicus: Magos Xenobiologis
ModMetaData.author: Ogliss
ModMetaData.description:
V1.6.5.1 Adds factions using xenos weapons from my Armoury mod.
Imperial: Militarum: Pawns:
Mechanicus: Pawns: Tech Priests(Humanlike) Skitarii(Humanlike) Sicarians
Eldar: Pawns: Farseer Warlock Guardian Defender/Storm/Support Ranger (Infiltrator) Dark Reaper Dark Reaper Exarch Dire Avenger Dire Avenger Exarch Fire Dragon Fire Dragon Exarch Howling Banshee Howling Banshee Exarch Swooping Hawk (Deep Strike) Swooping Hawk Exarch (Deep Strike) Striking Scorpion (Infiltrator) Striking Scorpion Exarch (Infiltrator) Warp Spider (Deep Strike) Warp Spider Exarch (Deep Strike)
Wraithguard Wraithblade Wraithlord
Avatar Tau: Pawns: Ethereal Pathfinder Shas'la/Shas'ui Firewarrior Shas'la/Shas'ui Kroot Warrior Kroot Hunter
Kroothound Krootox Knarloc
Necron: Pawns: Scarab Swarm Flayed Ones (Infiltrators) Warrior Immortal Tomb Spyder (Can repair dead/damaged necrons) Wraith (Move Through Cover, Phase Shifter) Destroyer Heavy Destroyer Destroyer Lord Lord
Incidents: Monolith
Ork: Pawns: Boy (Shoota, Slugga, Choppa) Eavy boy Nob (Shoota, Choppa) Eavy Nob Squig
Chaos: Pawns: Deamons: Horrors of Tzeentch (Pink, Blue, Brimstone) Flamer of Tzeentch (Normal, Exalted) Screamers of Tzeentch Lord of Change
Nurgling Plaguebearer Great Unclean One
Deamonette Keeper of Secrets
Bloodletter
Incidents: Warp Storm Deamonic Infestation Deamonic Incursion
Tyranids: Pawns: Ripper Swarm Homogaunt (Leaping Attack) Termagant Gargoyle Genestealer Warrior Lictor (Infiltrator, Move Through Cover) Ravener (Deep Strike) Hive Tyrant Carnifex Zoanthrope (Shielded)
Incidents:
Load Order info: Humanoid Alien Races( if used, ideally this should be loaded as close to the top of your list as possible ) SRTS( if used ) Combat Extended( if used ) Astra Militarum Core( if used ) Astra offical addons( if used ) Corruption Core( if used ) Corruption offical addons( if used ) Armoury Magos Xenobiologis( This Mod ) Playable Orkz,Eldar,Tau,Etc( if used ) order doesnt matter
Credits: Kajko: Textures for Ogyrn Heads Ogyrn Bodies
Fennbold: Textures for Kroothound Krootox
RebelRot: Textures for Kroot Heads Kroot Hair
SirLaLaPyon: Textures for Bloodletter
Pagoda: Textures for Guardian Ranger Dark Reaper Dire Avenger Fire Dragon Howling Banshee Swooping Hawk Striking Scorpion Warp Spider Wraithguard Wraithblade Avatar
Ogliss: XML, C# and Textures for Everything not listed above!
